sentences.en: ...carbon molecules with unusual chemical and catalytic properties.
sentences.cn: ...具有不寻常的化学催化属性的碳分子。

sentences.en: Environmental catalytic material of iron nitride nanoparticle was synthesized by Benzene - thermal method.
sentences.cn: 采用苯热法合成环境催化材料纳米氮化铁.

sentences.en: Glyoxylic acid was rapidly synthesized by catalytic oxidation of glyoxal with H 2 O 2.
sentences.cn: 在催化剂存在下,用双氧水氧化乙二醛溶液快速合成了乙醛酸.

sentences.en: Hydrogen transfer is one of the characteristics of catalytic cracking reaction.
sentences.cn: 氢转移是催化裂化的特征反应之一.

sentences.en: It is known as catalytic cracking.
sentences.cn: 这就是所谓的催化裂化.

sentences.en: Many other important catalytic parameters were deduced.
sentences.cn: 可以推导出很多其它重要的催化参数.

sentences.en: Menthol was obtained from lemon eucalyptus oil via cyclization and catalytic hydrogenation.
sentences.cn: 以柠檬桉叶油为主要原料经环化、催化氢化二步反应得到薄荷醇.

sentences.en: The air guards the catalytic converter from overload and possible resulting damage.
sentences.cn: 空气防止了催化式排气净化器的过载及可能产生的损坏.

sentences.en: The application of catalytic distillation reactor in benzene alkylation process is presented.
sentences.cn: 同时介绍了催化蒸馏反应器在苯烷基化工艺中的应用.

sentences.en: The dimethylbenzenes are obtained from catalytic reformate.
sentences.cn: 二甲苯可从催化重整得到.

sentences.en: The first catalytic converters were called conventional oxidation catalysts.
sentences.cn: 最初的转化器叫做常规氧化催化器.

sentences.en: The Fluid Catalytic Cracking ( FCC ) is the major gasoline - producing process in refinery.
sentences.cn: FCC(流化催化裂化 ) 是炼厂生产汽油的主要方法之一.

sentences.en: The high level of HC in the exhaust gas may damage the catalytic converter.
sentences.cn: 废气中大量的HC会损坏催化式排气净化器.

sentences.en: The preparation and catalytic properties of different bromine - free catalysts were discussed.
sentences.cn: 溴蒽类催化剂的活性较低,相应的研究也较少.

sentences.en: There are inherent difficulties in selecting any method as a standard for catalytic surface area determinations.
sentences.cn: 要选定一种测定催化剂表面积的标准方法具有其特有的困难.

sentences.en: Typical components in such a blend could be isooc'tane, alkylate and catalytic reformate.
sentences.cn: 这种混合物中的典型成份可能是异辛烷, 烷基化合物和催化重整产品.

phrases.tran_cn: 催化转化器；触媒转换器

trans.tran_cn: 接触反应的，起催化作用的
trans.tran_en: In chemistry, a catalytic substance or a substance with catalytic properties is a substance which increases the speed of a chemical reaction
